unnormalised: Hey guys, fascinating discussion on training! Reminds me of my cousin, Rohan, prepping for the Mumbai Marathon. He's doing serious distance, like 40 km a week. Plus, Dr. Sharma at the SAI centre in Bangalore put him on this crazy diet, costs him like Rs. 5000/month! He even converted his spare room (100 sq ft) into a mini gym. Hoping all this pays off! Good luck Rohan!
